moblima.control

Class MovieGoerController

  • Object
    • UserController
      • MovieGoerController

  • public class MovieGoerController
extends UserController
    Represents a controller for all moviegoer module functions The moviegoer module functions include Search/List movie View movie details – including reviews and ratings Check seat availability and selection of seat/s. Book and purchase ticket View booking history List the Top 5 ranking by ticket sales OR by overall reviewers’ ratings
    Author:
    SSP2 Team1

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private List<Booking> bookings
      The list of booking records
      private List<Date> holidays
      The list of the holiday dates
      private static MovieGoerController movieGoerController
      The moviegoer controller created by itself Since MovieGoerController is a singleton class It can only be created by itself
      private MovieGoerInterface movieGoerInterface 
      private List<MovieInfo> movies
      The list of all movie informations
      private List<MovieShowing> movieShowings
      The list of the information for movies to be shown

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      private MovieGoerController()
      To avoids other classes to create a moviegoer controller It can only be created by itself

        movieShowings - The list of the information for movies to be shown

                       int row,

                throws IndexOutOfBoundsException

      • calculatePrice

        public double calculatePrice(MovieShowing movieShowing,
                             boolean discount)
        Calculate the ticket price for a movie tickets Ticket all has a base price The final price is varied depending on if they are previliged person
        Parameters:
        movieShowing - The movie user wants to book
        discount - Whether the movie goer can enjoy discount
        Returns:
        The final price of the ticket
